### ERROR TIPS
- **Mining drill not working at position x=-15.0 y=-50.0**:  
  The mining drill at the specified position is not functioning. Ensure the drill has sufficient fuel and is placed on a valid resource patch. Verify the drill's status and correct any issues preventing it from operating.
